name: fluffy-octo-meme
description: A production-ready US federal government Planning, Programming, Budgeting, and Execution (PPBE) management and administration system with full GUI.

scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend && npm run test:e2e
scripts.test:coverage: npm run test:backend:coverage && npm run test:frontend:coverage
scripts.test:all: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend && npm run test:e2e
scripts.test:ci: npm run test:backend:coverage && npm run test:frontend:coverage && npm run test:e2e
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
